name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, A17 Pro chip, 256GB storage, ProMotion 120Hz, titanium design.

name: Apple iPhone 15 Plus
description: 6.7-inch display, A16 Bionic chip, 128GB storage, all-day battery life with advanced dual-camera system.

name: Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Gen
description: Wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, adaptive transparency, spatial audio, and MagSafe charging case.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: Lifestyle sneakers with a large Air Max unit, breathable mesh, and lightweight cushioning.

name: Nike Air Max 90
description: Classic running-inspired sneakers featuring leather overlays, durable rubber outsole, and iconic style.

name: Nike Air Force 1 Low
description: Timeless basketball shoes with premium leather upper, cushioned midsole, and streetwear design.

name: Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2
description: Designer sneakers with Primeknit upper, responsive Boost midsole, and signature Yeezy design.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: 6.8-inch QHD+ AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 200MP quad-camera system, 5000mAh battery.

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: 6.7-inch OLED display, Google Tensor G3, 50MP camera with advanced AI photo editing, and 7 years of updates.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 Console
description: Next-gen gaming console with 4K graphics, ultra-fast SSD, and immersive DualSense controller.
